item.title: {DELTA} {317} Can someone Make Me a PK Box At this Area? Tell if Cords needed!
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

Theres even co-ordinates for the entire wilderness. So if you do make another boolean which has co-ordinates, then the server would recognize it as funpk and wild so you’d probably lose your items either way.So if you have a funpk in the wild you just creating more work. I’m pretty sure I’m not the only person who thinks this but getting co-ordinates to make a boolean is not hard but it’s annoying, and excluding the co-ordinates which you want for funpk outta the isinwild boolean, will be more hassle. Just make a basic funpk outside of the wilderness…

Read full topic
